text: Segmentation can be done using two modes : Fixed threshold or Auto
The fixed threshold allows you to set a fixed value in order to create the mask.
Use the slider to set the minimum and the maximum value for the threshold. All the pixels comprised between these two values will be part of the mask.
Auto mode allows you to set a method that will select which value should be used for the threshold.
The best method usually depends on the type of data you are analysing.
